message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, even more so than my initial asking price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I have a budget in mind.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a new counteroffer of $10,500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
